summary: A PyTorch dataset wrapper that synchronously iterates over multiple underlying datasets, returning a combined tuple of their items (flattening inner tuples) and limiting its length to the shortest dataset. It also supports slicing, yielding a Subset object.
business_intent: Facilitate joint loading of related data streams (e.g., images with masks, audio with transcripts) in a single data pipeline, simplifying multi‑task or multi‑modal model training.
